changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.unit AS SELECT b.id, b.name, b.description, b.abbreviation, b.datatype, b.min, b.max, b.enumerated, b.notes, up.name AS updated_by, b.update_date FROM unit b JOIN agency up ON b.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.unit OWNER TO core;
